text.0: i laud the sevenrayed the tripleheaded agni allperfect in his parents bosom.
text.1: sunk in the lap of all that moves and moves not him who hath filled all luminous realms of heaven.
text.2: as a great steer he grew to these his parents sublime he stands untouched by eld farreaching.
text.3: he plants his footsteps on the lofty ridges of the broad earth his red flames lick the udder.
text.4: coming together to their common youngling both cows fairshaped spread forth in all directions.
text.5: measuring out the paths that must be travelled entrusting all desires to him the mighty.
text.6: the prudent sages lead him to his dwelling guarding with varied skill the everyouthful.
text.7: longing they turned their eyes unto the river to these the sun of men was manifested.
text.8: born noble in the regions aim of all mens eyes to be implored for life by great and small alike.
text.9: far as the wealthy one hath spread himself abroad he is the sire allvisible of this progeny.
